coreAttributes.name: Orcish Rotgut
coreAttributes.description: A flask of murky, dark liquor, with a viscous, almost slimy texture and very strange pungent aroma. Orcs brew this with a secret mix of "herbs", "extracts" and "vitamins", and claim it gives strength and courage. If you can swallow it down, you've already proven to yourself that you've got bravery and grit, so anything else seems easier in comparison.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
A chilling wave of grim determination washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_ARCANE, 2)] [#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_ENERGY_SHIELDING, 2)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unscrew)] the uncorks the flask, before tilting [npc.her] head back and bringing it up to [npc.her] waiting [npc.lips]. Acrid fumes pour from the opening, and [npc.she] quickly [npc.verb(gulp)] down the thick liquid before [npc.her] nerve fails [npc.name].
